title: BB001 - Impression Mining
body:
TL;DR Impression mining allows anyone to become a publisher brand / micro-influencer, paid by the Buzzed Bear DAO
Background

We want to empower our community members to get paid for the amazing work they do every day spreading the Buzzed Bear gospel,.

The motivation behind impression mining is to try and incentivize an increase of the number of accounts participating in Buzzed Bears promotion.
Implementation

The program would seek to treat any and every account as if they were a certified Buzzed Bear influencer/publisher, and to ascribe an open ended CPM (cost per 1000 impressions) for certain media types:

    Social Impressions (e.g. Twitter) - $10 / 1k impressions

This can later be expanded to new formats like twitter spaces, blogs and video content.

EXAMPLE: @bbhManiac brings receipts from 11 tweets about Buzzed Bears or its activities from July 2021 totaling 240k impressions; he is rewarded with $2.4k worth of ETH from the Honeypot.

Participants will simply snap a screenshot of their impression counts and submit to the discord channel for a monthly stipend (paid in ETH). Judging submissions is at the sole discretion of picked committee. The reviewers reserve the right to cap a payment or deem an account ineligible for current or future rewards.




The program will not tolerate/reward:

    Spamming followers
    Giveaways
    Paid impressions
    General trickery
    Inauthentic content
    Misleading content
    Saturation of themes

Notes:

1) Unless you have built up an audience beforehand, consistent success with this program will not generally come swiftly.
2) Any BBH member receiving a pre-determined stipend by the DAO or on a vesting program is not eligible for rewards
3) Guidelines and workshops for effective posting/publishing and brand-building will be held and shared. In general, content should aim to be:
    - Shareable
    - Aesthetically pleasing
    - Distribution-minded
    - Uniquely Insightful (Use-Case, how-to, history, stat/metric, story, testimonial, infographic, video)



*TL;DR Impression mining allows anyone to become a publisher brand / micro-influencer, paid by the Buzzed Bear DAO*

**Background**

We want to empower our community members to get paid for the amazing work they do every day spreading the Buzzed Bear gospel,.

The motivation behind impression mining is to try and incentivize an increase of the number of accounts participating in Buzzed Bears promotion.

**Implementation**

The program would seek to treat any and every account as if they were a certified Buzzed Bear influencer/publisher, and to ascribe an open ended CPM (cost per 1000 impressions) for certain media types:

    Social Impressions (e.g. Twitter) - $10 / 1k impressions

This can later be expanded to new formats like twitter spaces, blogs and video content.

    EXAMPLE: @bbhManiac brings receipts from 11 tweets about Buzzed Bears or its activities from July 2021 totaling 240k impressions; he is rewarded with $2.4k worth of ETH from the Honeypot.

Participants will simply snap a screenshot of their impression counts and submit to the discord channel for a monthly stipend (paid in ETH). Judging submissions is at the sole discretion of picked committee. The reviewers reserve the right to cap a payment or deem an account ineligible for current or future rewards.

Reward Committee:
 - defijesus
 - central_mv
 - geolightwork
 - Halstead

The program will not tolerate/reward:

    Spamming followers
    Giveaways
    Paid impressions
    General trickery
    Inauthentic content
    Misleading content
    Saturation of themes

Program Duration:
 - Retroactive rewards will be assigned.
 - 2 weeks after activation.

Notes:

1) Unless you have built up an audience beforehand, consistent success with this program will not generally come swiftly.
2) Any BBH member receiving a pre-determined stipend by the DAO or on a vesting program is not eligible for rewards
3) Guidelines and workshops for effective posting/publishing and brand-building will be held and shared. In general, content should aim to be:
    - Shareable
    - Aesthetically pleasing
    - Distribution-minded
    - Uniquely Insightful (Use-Case, how-to, history, stat/metric, story, testimonial, infographic, video)
